p: Sequence data were assembled with the SeqMan Pro software 7.0.1 (DNASTAR, Inc., Madison, WI, United States). Nucleotide and amino acid sequences of the HA and NA genes were aligned using the CLUSTAL and BLAST software. These HA and NA gene sequences from influenza A and B were archived in GenBank with the following accession numbers: (1) MN653601- MN653624 (influenza A, HA gene); (2) MN653549- MN653572 (influenza A, NA gene); and (3) MN653573- MN653600 and MT123908- MT123978 (influenza B, HA gene).
